# GPU-SIM Virtual Display Driver Configuration
# This file is read by the IddSampleDriver to set the virtual GPU name
# Location: C:\IddSampleDriver\gpu_sim_config.txt

# GPU Name (appears in Device Manager and system info)
NVIDIA GeForce GTX 780 Ti

# Manufacturer
NVIDIA Corporation

# Resolution config follows in option.txt
